thread.title: Vern Dickinson
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Vern Dickinson

author: Vern Dickinson
title: Vern Dickinson
text: After having a couple problems, their customer service tried very hard to try and make us happy after a rocky start. They did a good job of taking care of the issues I had with them. Thank You Jeff and everyone else I annoyed trying to get satisfaction. We will shop there again.
